"viewSettings": {"snippetImage": "/static/spark/art/icon_spark_48.png", "placeHolder": "Example: 1 + 1, or press CTRL + space", "aceMode": "ace/mode/python"}, "hasDataForChart": false, "id": "3a767895-9e1b-72c6-a093-50bd8b630cc0", "errors": [], "chartData": [], "statement_raw": "from random import random

NUM_SAMPLES = 1000

def sample(p):
    x, y = random(), random()
    return 1 if x*x + y*y < 1 else 0

count = sc.parallelize(xrange(0, NUM_SAMPLES)).map(sample) \
             .reduce(lambda a, b: a + b)
  
print "Pi is roughly %f" % (4.0 * count / NUM_SAMPLES)


", "showLogs": false, "chartMapLabel": null, "statement": "from random import random

NUM_SAMPLES = 1000

def sample(p):
    x, y = random(), random()
    return 1 if x*x + y*y < 1 else 0

count = sc.parallelize(xrange(0, NUM_SAMPLES)).map(sample) \
             .reduce(lambda a, b: a + b)
  
print "Pi is roughly %f" % (4.0 * count / NUM_SAMPLES)

"errors": [], "chartData": [], "statement_raw": "raw_data <- read.csv("apps/beeswax/data/web_logs.csv", header=FALSE) 
colnames(raw_data) <- c("time", "resource", "size", "city", "ip", "code", "c2", "c3")
filtered_data <- raw_data[!(raw_data$resource==""),]
aggergated_data <- aggregate(data.frame(count = filtered_data$resource), list(value = filtered_data$resource), length)
sorted_data <- aggergated_data[order(aggergated_data$count),]
par(bg=c("#F5F5F5"), mai=c(3.4,0.7,0.4,0))
colfunc <- colorRampPalette(c("#205875", "#87bad5"))

barplot(sorted_data$count,names.arg=sorted_data$value, main="Resource hits", las=2, col=colfunc(nrow(sorted_data)), ylim=c(0,300))", "showLogs": false, "chartMapLabel": null, "statement": "raw_data <- read.csv("apps/beeswax/data/web_logs.csv", header=FALSE) 
colnames(raw_data) <- c("time", "resource", "size", "city", "ip", "code", "c2", "c3")
filtered_data <- raw_data[!(raw_data$resource==""),]
aggergated_data <- aggregate(data.frame(count = filtered_data$resource), list(value = filtered_data$resource), length)
sorted_data <- aggergated_data[order(aggergated_data$count),]
par(bg=c("#F5F5F5"), mai=c(3.4,0.7,0.4,0))
colfunc <- colorRampPalette(c("#205875", "#87bad5"))

barplot(sorted_data$count,names.arg=sorted_data$value, main="Resource hits", las=2, col=colfunc(nrow(sorted_data)), ylim=c(0,300))", "codemirrorSize": 100, "progress": 0, "type": "r", "chartScatterGroup": null, "status": "ready", "previousChartOptions": {}, "hasProperties": false, "jobs": [], "variableNames": [], "resultsKlass": "results r", "chartYMulti": [], "chartType": "bars", "properties": {}, "name": "R with plotting", "chartScatterSize": null, "availableSnippets": [{"interface": "hiveserver2", "type": "hive", "name": "Hive", "options": {}}, {"interface": "hiveserver2", "type": "impala", "name": "Impala", "options": {}}, {"interface": "livy", "type": "spark", "name": "Spark", "options": {}}, {"interface": "livy", "type": "pyspark", "name": "PySpark", "options": {}}, {"interface": "livy", "type": "r", "name": "R", "options": {}}, {"interface": "livy-batch", "type": "jar", "name": "Spark Submit Jar", "options": {}}, {"interface": "livy-batch", "type": "py", "name": "Spark Submit Python", "options": {}}, {"interface": "text", "type": "text", "name": "Text", "options": {}}], "chartYSingle": null, "settingsVisible": false, "checkStatusTimeout": null, "isLoading": false}], "uuid": "d1e3715a-8a6a-94bb-306e-0c2f2385a480"}
